column5: Hey gang.  Well I usually try to make it out to BOQ atleast once every fall when the action heats up for those giant gold fish. Last year I was able to go out with a few buddies and we did quite well and I posted a video for that, last year.  This year after hearing reports of the fishing from my buddy, young_one aka fischen aka Will. Frozenfire and I decided to head out for some of that action. We headed out on November 23rd while Will was there for a tournament that he insisted that we should have joined... We started our day at my place at about 3am and our day ended at about 5pm. I'll let the pictures and video speak for itself. Enjoy.

Can't hear video while at work.  But want to.  You guys did awesome with the editing and angles.  Liked watching.  Some excellent pics too!  And I so wanted to go fishing that same day in November... but couldn't.
Cool vid.   I wish I had the patience for edititing,     Sweet fish!    Ive never fished quinte but  once the boat upgrade in the spring happens I will be all over it next fall.
Nice video...  Looks like an awesome day
Great job with the video. Looks like you guys had a blast, thanks for putting that together
That was an awesome video to watch.  Looked like true fun and better than most fishing shows I've seen.  Good stuff.
Great pictures and video , that looks like a beauty November day for fishing
That was a great video, congrats on the BOQ trip and sharing your fishing.  David  aka  Superdad
Wow, sweet.   We did not make it this year, but have for at least the last 10 years, brings back great memories, thanks for sharing

Great video guys. It's amazing what you can do with a GoPro. I remember a video you did before and this has equally good production value. And you can fish too. I saw Italo and his crew film a show this past September and they had a shoulder held behemoth of a setup. You guys can do the same for I don't how many thousands less $$$$.  And those goldies are just beauty fat little buggers. If our long Walleye here on Erie had the girth a Quinte Walleye does we are talking world records being broken for sure.
